author: ringstrom
msg: Moved the documentation of the auth parameters (SVN_AUTH_PARAM_*)
to where the credential types are declared.  Also added more
documentation and improved some doxygen comments.

author: ghudson
msg: Add r8098: Fix path for loading RA modules.

author: ghudson
msg: From Ben Reser: don't use the .so link when loading RA libraries,
because .so links are only supposed to be necessary for development.
Instead use the .so.0 link (APR versioning requires the number
